alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 5:03PM MST until August 24 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 503 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Flagstaff, Doney Park, Pioneer Valley, Hutchinson Acres, Macann Estates, Timberline, Pine Mountain Estates, Hutchison Acres and Little Elden Springs Horse Camp. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 423 and 427. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... San Francisco Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the . Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
